# updateWindows()

**Instance Method**

Sends an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/update()] message to each onscreen window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func updateWindows()
```

## Discussion

This method is invoked automatically in the main event loop after each event when running in `NSDefaultRunLoopMode` or `NSModalRunLoopMode`. This method is not invoked automatically when running in `NSEventTrackingRunLoopMode`.

When this method begins, it posts an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/willUpdateNotification] to the default notification center. When it successfully completes, it posts an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/didUpdateNotification].

## Related Documentation

- **applicationDidUpdate(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the app’s windows did update.
- **applicationWillUpdate(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the app is about to update its windows.
- **update()**: Updates the window.

## Updating Windows

- **setWindowsNeedUpdate(_:)**: Sets whether the receiver’s windows need updating when the receiver has finished processing the current event.
